root: ^You truly are incredible. As expected, no foe is any match to a Pilgrim.
^Even with the world in disarray, the Prophecies still hold true.
^Without their leader, the Beasts should now become more scattered, and we can once again find safe routes to gather supplies.
^Though, I must ask... have you found anything on your journey there?

c-0: ^These were the supplies our foraging team were attempting to get. At least... this finally made its way back to us.
^Still, I will not give up hope. I will continue to pray.
^Nonetheless, I believe you deserve a generous reward for your deeds. Here you go.
^You have earned my eternal gratitude. May God bless you.
